question: What is the main objective of the 'Samruddha Krishi Niti-2020' proposed by the finance minister of Odisha during the 2020-21 budget presentation?
option1: To save the crops from environmental disaster
option3: To provide free health insurance to the farmers
explanation: \'Samruddha Krishi Niti-2020\' aims at an increase in the income generation of the farmers. It was proposed by the Finance Minister of Odisha Shri Niranjan Pujari.
